item.title: Switching my work flow to Pomodoro for grad studies - part I: motivation
item.description: The start of my journey as a PhD student last September was a big step, but also an opportunity to review and improve my working habits. My day time had to be used properly, both for results’ sake and to be able to keep a balanced life. I had been introduced to the Pomodoro technique at Equisense (thanks Camille!) but remained skeptical as for its potential value within my work flow at the time.
